name: Subject-Zero
description:
This is a story game. Players take on the role of the protagonist from a first-person perspective and read the story of the bionic man Zero.

The video shows one of the best endings of the game's four endings.

Game operation method: click the mouse

The following content may involve revealing the plot, suggest a complete experience of the plot after the drop down:

I made this game to show that artificial humans have the same emotions as humans, and it's not right to just use their brains and try to replace them with humans.

I saw a show a long time ago about parents who tried to replace their children with smarter bots, and then lost control of the situation and the bots destroyed their families. In this game, the protagonist Onyx is the child who was replaced. Although he finally stopped the matter by his own strength and tried to recover the artificial man, the emotional damage caused to him is irreversible.

In the best ending of the game, the artificial and the original child of the family become good brothers, because the younger brother of the artificial does not care about his true identity, he thinks he is treated like a human. The older brother was able to give up his hatred for his younger brother due to his parents' affection for him, and the result was a happy ending.

Best ending option: Read the letter - do not delete the memory - Keep Zero

Options for Ending 2: Read the letter - delete the memory - Keep Zero

Options for Ending 3: Read the letter - Destroy Zero

Option of Ending 4: Do not read the letter -Destroy Zero

The game uses materials from free materials website aigei, Qianku
